_source.short_desc: Network Monitoring & Management Software for MSPs and IT professionals
_source.long_desc:
Domotz is a leading Network Monitoring and Management platform for Networks and Connected Devices. 

We offer powerful network management software for MSP's, IT managers, Integrators, Security Professionals.  

We offer the complete solution to cost-effectively manage and monitor your customers networks with plug and play setup, a friendly UX, and a comprehensive feature set, accessible from any desktop browser or mobile device.
_source.pricing_details: The price is per network and includes full monitoring and management features for any device in the network.
_source.target_audience:
This product is targeted to those that provide remote and digital tech support including:
- MSPs and TSPs
- IT Professionals 
- AV & System Integrators
- Security Professionals

related_products.short_desc: An award-winning solution that delivers comprehensive security for small and medium business devices, data, and employees.
related_products.features:
Avast Ultimate Business Security is the best cybersecurity and privacy protection to secure your users, devices, and applications from malware, phishing, ransomware, and advanced cyberattacks.
- It provides powerful online protection and automation, keeping devices and applications updated and secure.
- Delivers Mobile Protection, Password & Webcam Protection, USB Protection, and VPN.
- Includes Patch Management to automate the patching process, keeping devices secure.

related_products.short_desc: Pulseway is an award-winning IT management platform that gives you complete control over everything IT.
related_products.features: Monitor, manage and control your IT systems and applications in real-time using any smartphone, tablet or desktop. Pulseway has done for System Administration what smartphones did for email - you get a notification, see an issue and sort it in seconds. Monitoring is no longer a drama - you just monitor and instantly respond to server issues as soon as they arise. It's like having a NOC in your pocket.

related_products.short_desc: ManageEngine OpManager is 5 in 1 integrated network management software for performance monitoring, fault diagnosis & troubleshooting.
related_products.features: ManageEngine OpManager is an integrated network management platform that helps large enterprises, service providers, and SMEs manage their data centers & IT infrastructure efficiently and cost effectively. It offers network performance monitoring, physical and virtual server monitoring, traffic analysis, configuration management, firewall log management and IP address management. It provides business view, email/sms based alerts, workflow automation, customized reports and combined snapshot view

related_products.short_desc: ZoneRanger is a patented firewall proxy appliance that inspects and validates network management traffic before crossing firewalls.
related_products.features: A solution that elevates and eases network security.  ZoneRanger aggregates management traffic, performs deep packet inspection (DPI), and subsequently encrypts traffic prior to forwarding it on through the firewall into the high secured/corporate network(s) to forward traffic to defined destinations.

similar_products.short_desc: Cloud software that connects people, systems & data into a single view for visibility and actionable intelligence across operations.
similar_products.features: PagerDuty, Inc. (NYSE:PD) is a leader in digital operations management. In an always-on world, organizations of all sizes trust PagerDuty to help them deliver a perfect digital experience to their customers, every time. Teams use PagerDuty to identify issues and opportunities in real time and bring together the right people to fix problems faster and prevent them in the future.

similar_products.short_desc: End-to-end observability for enterprise IT and MSPs. LogicMonitor's fully-automated monitoring platform is cloud-first and hybrid ready
similar_products.features: LogicMonitor's SaaS-based observability and IT operations data collaboration platform helps ITOps, developers, MSPs and business leaders gain visibility into and predictability across the technologies that modern organizations depend on to deliver extraordinary employee and customer experiences. LogicMonitor seamlessly monitors everything from networks to applications to the cloud, empowering companies to focus less on troubleshooting and more on innovation.

similar_products.short_desc: Auvik's software simplifies & automates network monitoring & management to give you complete network visibility & control.
similar_products.features: Auvik's cloud-based network management software gives you true network visibility and control in under an hour. Real-time network mapping and inventory mean you'll always know exactly what's where, even as your users move. Automated config backup and restore on network devices mean you'll mitigate network risk with no manual effort. And Auvik TrafficInsights shows you who's on the network, which apps they're using, and where their traffic is going.

similar_products.short_desc: ManageEngine OpManager is 5 in 1 integrated network management software for performance monitoring, fault diagnosis & troubleshooting.
similar_products.features: ManageEngine OpManager is an integrated network management platform that helps large enterprises, service providers, and SMEs manage their data centers & IT infrastructure efficiently and cost effectively. It offers network performance monitoring, physical and virtual server monitoring, traffic analysis, configuration management, firewall log management and IP address management. It provides business view, email/sms based alerts, workflow automation, customized reports and combined snapshot view

similar_products.short_desc: The N-able N-central? remote monitoring and management platform is designed to make managing complex IT networks simple.
similar_products.features: The N-able N-central? remote monitoring and management platform is designed to help managed services providers handle complex networks with ease. With extensive automation and in-depth configurability options, security features like antivirus, endpoint detection and response, patch management, and integrated backup, N-central is built to help MSP businesses efficiently manage intricate networks from one easy-to-use platform.

similar_products.short_desc: Full-stack IT infrastructure management & observability platform for large enterprise networks, infrastructures, and applications.
similar_products.features: Full stack IT infrastructure management platform that provides a single source of truth for performance & availability monitoring for large enterprise networks, infrastructures, & applications. Netreo is used by: IT Executives to have full visibility into their infrastructure & how it is affecting the business they support; IT Engineering departments as a decision support system for capacity planning, & architecting new solutions; IT Operations teams for real time visibility into what is failing

similar_products.short_desc: TotalView monitors and root-cause troubleshoots network, voice/UC/Video, and cloud for enterprise networks, VARs, and MSPs.
similar_products.features:
TotalView makes network monitoring and root-cause troubleshooting quick and easy: It deeply interrogates all network devices and interfaces for actionable intelligence, and then uses a built-in heuristics engine to analyze the information to come up with plain-English answers of what is broken: outages, performance problems, cable faults, resource limitations, micro-burst link floods, VLAN tagging misconfigurations, etc.
Within 1 hour of deployment, you will know everything your network knows.

similar_products.short_desc: Cloud-based solution that includes network security, user management, content filtering, and performance optimization tools.
similar_products.features: Cloud-based solution that includes network security, user management, content filtering, and performance optimization tools.

similar_products.short_desc: A single web-based console you can use to discover, configure and monitor your entire wireless network.
similar_products.features: A web-based console you can use to discover, configure and monitor your entire wireless network. AMP's easy-to-use monitoring screens, you can see real-time data and trend reports for every user, device, and segment of your network. In addition to unparalleled network monitoring, AMP provides the core management functionality you need to support even the largest wireless networks with tens of thousands of users: network discovery, configuration management, reporting, alerting, auditing, and more

similar_products.short_desc: Network monitoring solution that provides everything you expect, plus automation, huge scale, easy integration and simple pricing.
similar_products.features: NMIS manages a vast array of devices on simple to complex networks. Extend NMIS with advanced modules to get access to additional capabilities. Deploy wherever you need and only pay for the devices being managed. Fast deployment, simple pricing, hugely scalable, flexible and easy to integrate into your business. Save time with automation. Perfect for on-premises, private and public cloud. Talk to us about what you need and we'll have it covered. Book a no-obligation demo now.

related_categories.description: IT Management software provides the tools and process for controlling and monitoring computer networks, including: operating systems, applications, network devices, security measures, mainframes, access control systems, web services, and databases. Organizations use IT Management applications to manage activities across their systems, evaluating capacity, user activities, software inventory and installation, server availability, and virus or malware protection. IT Management software is related to Application Performance Management software, Business Continuity software, Database Management software, Server Management software, Network Monitoring software and Network Security software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Network Monitoring software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Network Monitoring tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Network Monitoring software assesses and evaluates computer systems and networks in order to maximize availability of system resources. These applications provide an integrated solution for ongoing observation, evaluation and forecasting as well as historical assessments. Organizations use the diagnostic tools provided by Network Monitoring software to identify problem areas and make strategic resource decisions regarding their technology operations. Network Monitoring software is related to Application Performance Management software, Network Security software and IT Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Network Security software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Network Security tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Network Security software prevents unauthorized access to a computer network. Organizations use these applications to prevent unauthorized, malicious or inadvertent intrusions into or usage of secure systems. Network Security solutions are designed to recognize legitimate traffic over today's complex enterprise networks and isolate abnormal events for further investigation as well as to perform key security audit and regulatory compliance functions. Features can include anti-spam, anti-virus, and intrusion detection. Network Security software is related to Computer Security software and Network Monitoring software.

category_features.name: Bandwidth Monitoring
category_features.definition: Measure the actual bandwidth available on a local network (LAN or WiFi)

category_features.name: Baseline Manager
category_features.definition: Define network parameters and threshold settings to monitor network health and take necessary precautions

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: Provide insights on the network's performance and health on a continuous real-time basis

category_features.name: IP Address Monitoring
category_features.definition: Monitor the IP addresses of the incoming traffic

category_features.name: Internet Usage Monitoring
category_features.definition: Monitor the amount of internet bandwidth and speed utilized  each resource in a shared network

category_features.name: Network Analysis
category_features.definition: Run tests on the network to find the root cause of the network issues

category_features.name: Network Resource Management
category_features.definition: Manage efficient and effective use of network resources

category_features.name: Server Monitoring
category_features.definition: Continuously scan servers on a designated network to monitor health and search for any irregularities or failures

category_features.name: Service Level Agreement (SLA) Management
category_features.definition: Track current service level agreements based on quantifiable metrics

category_features.name: Uptime Reporting
category_features.definition: Track the time for which a designated network or a website is available to the users over a given period of time

category_features.name: Web Traffic Reporting
category_features.definition: Keep track of the amount of data sent and received  the visitors to a website

category_features.name: Access Controls/Permissions
category_features.definition: Define levels of authorization for access to specific files/folders

category_features.name: Alerts/Notifications
category_features.definition: Alerts/notifications within the system

category_features.name: Capacity Management
category_features.definition: Monitor/analyze service demand and performance to plan for adequate resources to meet current/future business requirements

category_features.name: Compliance Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage non-adherence to policies in a service, product, process, or supplier behavior

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: An assembly of graphs and charts for tracking statistics and metrics

category_features.name: IT Reporting
category_features.definition: Assemble and deliver relevant data points for IT

category_features.name: Inventory Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage the quantity of resources on hand to maintain proper supply

category_features.name: Issue Auditing
category_features.definition: Track and monitor past issues and issue changes

category_features.name: License Management
category_features.definition: Track and organize the number of licenses available to the organization

category_features.name: Maintenance Scheduling
category_features.definition: Schedule predetermined or ad hoc maintenance services and labor requests

category_features.name: Patch Management
category_features.definition: Install software updates and bug fixes remotely

category_features.name: Remote Access/Control
category_features.definition: Access a computer or data from a distant location

category_features.name: Backup and Recovery
category_features.definition: Create backups and provide methods to recover deleted/lost data

category_features.name: Billing & Invoicing
category_features.definition: Create and manage monetary interactions between parties (ie. bills and invoices)

category_features.name: CRM
category_features.definition: Contact and lead management to track interactions and notes about clients and prospects

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: An assembly of graphs and charts for tracking statistics and metrics

category_features.name: Issue Management
category_features.definition: Identify and respond to unexpected problems or failures (ie. "negative events")

category_features.name: Live Chat
category_features.definition: Ability to chat online in real time

category_features.name: Project Management
category_features.definition: Plan and coordinate all the resources, costs and time needed to execute assignments

category_features.name: Scheduling
category_features.definition: Plan availability and assign specific time slots for tasks and resources

category_features.name: Alerts / Escalation
category_features.definition: System notifications about the need to bump priority level of ticket

related_products.short_desc: Cloud Platform is a set of modular cloud-based services that allow you to create anything from simple websites to complex applications.
related_products.features: Google Cloud Platform is a set of modular cloud-based services that allow you to create anything from simple websites to complex applications. New customers get $300 in free credits to fully explore and conduct an assessment of Google Cloud. You won't be charged until you upgrade. Google Cloud Platform offers a modular-based platform providing build and scale services to businesses of any size within any industry. In addition to cloud storage and scalable data warehouses with built-in machine learning, Google Cloud Platform provides relational and non-relational databases for transactions, complex queries, streaming, offline sync, and more. A range of tools for document storage, data warehousing, security key enforcement, app creation, API management, AI and machine learning are also available.

related_products.short_desc: Atera is the ultimate all-in-one remote IT management solution for MSPs, IT consultants and IT departments. Try Atera for free today!
related_products.features: Atera offers a comprehensive network monitoring for MSPs and IT Professionals. The platform provides one integrated solution: full remote monitoring and management (RMM), PSA, remote access, patch management, billing, reports, and so much more! Atera's disruptive pricing model also helps managed IT service providers scale their business while providing continued best-in-class service. All plans include unlimited devices, meaning you only pay per technician. Try Atera for free today!

related_products.short_desc: Get at-a-glance up/down status and performance info for network devices, servers, storage and wireless - in the cloud or on-premises.
related_products.features: Get at-a-glance up/down status and performance information for network devices, servers, storage and wireless - whether in the cloud or on-premises. Expand your management tool kit by adding proactive monitoring for network traffic, applications, virtual environments and device configurations  all through the same intuitive interface. Automatically discover and map your entire network and use customized dashboards to get the information you need to streamline troubleshooting.

related_products.short_desc: Thousands of MSPs and IT Departments use Kaseya VSA Network Monitoring software to automate IT. Get your demo today!
related_products.features: MSPs and internal IT teams get visibility into network performance with Kaseya VSA. Monitor all aspects of network connected devices. Maintain up-time and track key metrics on monitored endpoints and ensure network and system availability. Optimize network performance and eliminate network bottlenecks and performance issues.

related_products.short_desc: Pulseway's Network Monitoring software gives you total visibility across your network. Easily Monitor & Control your Network devices.
related_products.features: Pulseway's Network Monitoring software gives you total visibility across your network. Automatic discovery and diagramming, makes managing your network simple, intuitive and efficient. Discover your entire IT network and mass deploy the Pulseway agent in minutes so you can have a better insight into what issues are affecting you.

related_products.short_desc: New Relic is the only unified data platform that empowers engineers to get all telemetry paired with powerful full-stack analysis tools
related_products.features: New Relic One empowers engineers with a data-driven approach to planning, building, deploying and running software. Offering the only unified data platform that empowers engineers to get all telemetry paired with powerful full-stack analysis tools, New Relic helps engineers get past the what to uncover the why. This improves uptime, reliability and efficiency to deliver exceptional customer experiences that fuel growth. Uncover the why with New Relic.

related_products.short_desc: Trusted by 92 of the fortune 100, Splunk helps you investigate, monitor, analyze, and act on all of your organizations data.
related_products.features: Trusted by 92 of the fortune 100, Splunk is a customizable data analytics platform that empowers you to investigate, monitor, analyze and act. From IT to security to business operations, Splunk is the data-to-everything platform that enables you to take action in real-time. With Splunk, you can predict and prevent IT problems, streamline your entire security stack, minimize unplanned downtime, and explore and visualize business processes for increased transparency all in one platform.

related_products.short_desc: 500,000 reasons to try PRTG Network Monitor: That's the number of users that rely on it every day. Why not start your trial right away?
related_products.features: Say hello to PRTG Network Monitor, our award-winning and all-inclusive monitoring solution. It takes care of everything happening in your IT infrastructure, featuring an easy-to-use and intuitive interface, as well as our mind-blowing customer support. PRTG scales to networks of any size, making life so much easier for our customers with growing networks, as they can simply stick with PRTG. Plus, it obviously saves costs by avoiding critical outages, while optimizing the overall network quality.

related_products.short_desc: Opsgenie is a modern incident management and response solution for operating always-on services.
related_products.features: Opsgenie is a modern incident management and response solution for operating always-on services. We empower Dev and Ops teams to plan for service disruptions and stay in control during incidents. Opsgenie centralizes alerts, notifies the right people reliably, and enables them to take rapid action. Our deep integrations with 200+ ITSM tools enable you to break down silos between Dev and IT Teams, correlate incidents to code deployments, and easily measure the full impact of a major incident.

related_categories.description: Application Performance Management software manages and measures application performance levels and status, enabling accurate, real-time observations of system health and capacity. Organizations use the sophisticated diagnostic tools provided by Application Performance Management software to make strategic resource decisions regarding their technology operations. These applications provide an integrated solution for ongoing observation, evaluation and forecasting as well as historical assessments. Application Performance Management software is related to Network Monitoring software and IT Management software.

related_categories.description: Computer Security software automates the security and monitoring of computer systems from malware, threats and unauthorized use. These applications scan and monitor an organization's computer network to evaluate potential vulnerabilities. Additionally, Computer Security solutions provide customizable network security solutions as well as those preconfigured for a variety of regulatory standards. Computer Security software provides for real-time reporting on network security as well as incident reports for potential security breaches. Computer Security software is related to Network Security software.

related_categories.description: IT Management software provides the tools and process for controlling and monitoring computer networks, including: operating systems, applications, network devices, security measures, mainframes, access control systems, web services, and databases. Organizations use IT Management applications to manage activities across their systems, evaluating capacity, user activities, software inventory and installation, server availability, and virus or malware protection. IT Management software is related to Application Performance Management software, Business Continuity software, Database Management software, Server Management software, Network Monitoring software and Network Security software.

related_categories.description: Network Security software prevents unauthorized access to a computer network. Organizations use these applications to prevent unauthorized, malicious or inadvertent intrusions into or usage of secure systems. Network Security solutions are designed to recognize legitimate traffic over today's complex enterprise networks and isolate abnormal events for further investigation as well as to perform key security audit and regulatory compliance functions. Features can include anti-spam, anti-virus, and intrusion detection. Network Security software is related to Computer Security software and Network Monitoring software.
